constants.name: edge_source
constants.header: Translation table for sources of particles, momentum and heat.

int.name: unspecified
int.description: Unspecified source type

int.name: total
int.description: Combined source excluding time derivative

int.name: nbi
int.description: Source from Neutral Beam Injection

int.name: ec
int.description: Sources from electron cyclotron heating and current drive

int.name: lh
int.description: Sources from lower hybrid heating and current drive

int.name: ic
int.description: Sources from heating at the ion cyclotron range of frequencies

int.name: fusion
int.description: Sources from fusion reactions, e.g. alpha particle heating

int.name: ohmic
int.description: Source from ohmic heating

int.name: bremsstrahlung
int.description: Source from bremsstrahlung; radiation losses are negative sources

int.name: synchrotron_radiation
int.description: Source from synchrotron radiation; radiation losses are negative sources

int.name: line_radiation
int.description: Source from line radiation; radiation losses are negative sources

int.name: collisional_equipartition
int.description: Collisional equipartition

int.name: cold_neutrals
int.description: Source of cold neutrals

int.name: bootstrap_current
int.description: Bootstrap current

int.name: pellet
int.description: Sources from injection

int.name: auxiliary
int.description: Source from auxiliary systems, e.g. heating and current drive systems

int.name: ic_nbi
int.description: A combination of the ic and nbi sources

int.name: ic_fusion
int.description: A combination of the ic and fusion sources

int.name: ic_nbi_fusion
int.description: A combination of the ic and fusion sources

int.name: ec_lh
int.description: A combination of the ec and lh sources

int.name: ec_ic
int.description: A combination of the ec and ic sources

int.name: lh_ic
int.description: A combination of the lh and ic sources

int.name: ec_lh_ic
int.description: A combination of the ec, lh and ic sources

int.name: gas_puff
int.description: Gas puff

int.name: killer_gas_puff
int.description: Killer gas puff

int.name: radiation
int.description: Total radiation source; radiation losses are negative sources

int.name: cyclotron_radiation
int.description: Source from cyclotron radiation; radiation losses are negative sources

int.name: cyclotron_synchrotron_radiation
int.description: Source from combined cyclotron and synchrotron radiation; radiation losses are negative sources

int.name: impurity_radiation
int.description: Line radiation and Bremsstrahlung source; radiation losses are negative sources.

int.name: particles_to_wall
int.description: Particle pumping by the wall; negative source for plasma and positive source for the wall

int.name: particles_to_pump
int.description: Particle pumping by external pump; negative source for plasma and positive source for the pump

int.name: charge_exchange
int.description: Source from charge exchange. Charge exchange losses are negative sources

int.name: transport
int.description: Source term related to transport processes

int.name: neoclassical
int.description: Source term related to neoclassical processes

int.name: equipartition
int.description: Equipartition due to collisions and turbulence

int.name: turbulent_equipartition
int.description: Turbulent equipartition

int.name: runaways
int.description: Source from run-away processes; includes both electron and ion run-away

int.name: excitation
int.description: Source from excitation processes

int.name: neutrals
int.description: Combined source from all plasma-neutrals interactions

int.name: total_linearized
int.description: Combined source (linearized) excluding time derivative

int.name: background
int.description: Background source

int.name: prescribed
int.description: Source prescribed from code input parameters

int.name: time_derivative
int.description: Source associated with time derivative

int.name: atomic_ionization
int.description: Source from atomic ionization (not accounting for charge exchange)

int.name: molecular_ionization
int.description: Source from molecular ionization/dissociation (not accounting for charge exchange)

int.name: ionization
int.description: Source from ionization (combined, but not accounting for charge exchange)

int.name: recombination
int.description: Source from recombination (not accounting for charge exchange)

int.name: compression
int.description: Internal energy source from compression

int.name: bulk_motion
int.description: Internal energy source correction for bulk motion

int.name: database
int.description: Source from database entry

int.name: gaussian
int.description: Artificial source with a gaussian profile
